name: MEDIONLife+
0:
”Alexa, turn on table lamp”
”Alexa, set table lamp brightness to twenty percent”
”Alexa, brighten table lamp”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The MEDION Life+ skill for Amazon Alexa allows you to interact even more easily with your MEDION Life+ components by voice command. Activate the Skill and link it to your MEDION Life+ account. MEDION Life+ skill for Amazon Alexa is compatible with MEDION Life+ products such as plug strips, IP cameras or RGB LED lights.

PLEASE NOTE: Speech recognition does not authenticate and therefore does not authorise the person or age.

Connecting Alexa to your MEDION Life+ products:
1. Download the "MEDION Life+" app from Amazon, Google play or itunes market
2. Register a MEDION Life+ account in your "MEDION Life+" app
3. Make sure your MEDION Life+ Smart Home products are switched on and available
4. Setup your devices in your "MEDION Life+" app and change the device name if you like 
5. Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from Google play, itunes or Amazon app market
6. Configure your voice assistant with the "Alexa" app
7. Search for "MEDION Life+" Skill within the "Alexa" app skills category
8. Activate your "MEDION Life+" Skill and log in with your MEDION Life+ credentials
9. After successfully setting up your devices, try to test your skill via your voice assistant

Examples for your "MEDION Life+" Skill

Illumination:
- Alexa, turn on the light
- Alexa, dim the light
- Alexa, set the light to red
Socket bar:
- Alexa, turn on socket 1
- Alexa, turn off socket 1
- Alexa, turn on USB

ATTENTION: Speech recognition does not authenticate and therefore does not authorize the person or age.
